name: Mountain Adventure Trek
summary: A thrilling trek through rugged mountain trails with stunning views.
description: Embark on a 7-day adventure through the Alps, featuring breathtaking landscapes, challenging ascents, and cozy mountain lodges.

name: Coastal Explorer
summary: Discover the beauty of coastal cliffs and beaches.
description: A relaxing 5-day journey along the Amalfi Coast, with guided tours of historic towns and scenic boat rides.

name: Desert Safari
summary: An exhilarating journey through vast desert landscapes.
description: Experience a 10-day camel trek across the Sahara, with nights under the stars and visits to ancient oases.

name: Jungle Expedition
summary: Explore the heart of the Amazon rainforest.
description: An 8-day adventure through dense jungles, with wildlife spotting and river rafting.

name: City Highlights Tour
summary: A fast-paced tour of iconic city landmarks.
description: Discover Paris in 3 days, visiting the Eiffel Tower, Louvre, and Notre-Dame with expert guides.

name: Arctic Wilderness
summary: A journey to the frozen north with stunning auroras.
description: A 12-day expedition in the Arctic, featuring dog sledding and northern lights viewing.

name: Volcano Hike
summary: Hike active volcanoes and explore geothermal sites.
description: A 6-day adventure in Iceland, hiking volcanic trails and relaxing in hot springs.

name: Island Hopper
summary: Sail through tropical islands with pristine beaches.
description: A 9-day sailing tour through the Caribbean, visiting multiple islands and snorkeling spots.

name: Cultural Odyssey
summary: Immerse in the rich history and culture of ancient cities.
description: A 14-day tour through Egypt, exploring pyramids, temples, and the Nile River.

name: Wildlife Safari
summary: Track exotic wildlife in their natural habitat.
description: An 11-day safari in Kenya, spotting the Big Five and exploring savannah landscapes.
